Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Ballistics computer calculation error. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Ammunition Feed component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 17/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
